item.title: By: Katie
item.dc:creator: Katie
item.description:
Hi Gill,
Oops, thanks for spotting that, I've added the step into the recipe now! Yes, you fold it in just after the chocolate. Hope you enjoy them :)
Katie
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Gill Hume
item.dc:creator: Gill Hume
item.description:
Hi Katie, I love making your cupcakes and am looking forward to trying these when I have a moment.Please could you tell me when you add the flour to the brownies. Is it after the chocolate?
Thanks Gill
item.content:encoded:
Hi Katie,
I love making your cupcakes and am looking forward to trying these when I have a moment.Please could you tell me when you add the flour to the brownies. Is it after the chocolate?

Thanks Gill
